import React from "react" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./Navbar.css" const Navbar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userTokenData")) const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("userToken") localStorage.removeItem("userTokenData") navigate("/login") } return (
MyShop
  • Products
    • {user?.isAdmin && (
  • Add Product
    • )}
    {user ? ( <>
  • Hi, {user.name}
    • ) : ( <>
  • Login
  • Register
    • )}
) } export default Navbar
